original_title: Showers or thundershowers to occur over most parts of the country
original_body_lines: The Met Department predicts that showers or thundershowers will occur at several places over most parts of the country after 1 pm today.
Fairly heavy showers about 75mm are likely at some places in the Central, Sabaragamuwa and North-central provinces.
Several spells of showers can also be expected in coastal areas of the Western province and in Galle and Matara districts during the morning too.
